mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REVIEW ( REVIEW_NUMBER, ORDER_NUMBER, ISBN, WRITING_TIME, CONTENT, SCORE) VALUES (SEQ_REVIEW_NUMBER.nextval, #{orderNumber}, #{isbn}, sysdate, #{content}, #{score})
mapper.select: SELECT substr(m.name,1,1) || lpad('*',length(m.name)-2,'*') || substr(m.name, length(m.name), 1) AS name, TO_CHAR(re.WRITING_TIME,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS writing_time, re.CONTENT AS content, re.SCORE as score FROM REVIEW re INNER JOIN PURCHASE p on re.ORDER_NUMBER = p.ORDER_NUMBER INNER JOIN MEMBER m on p.MEMBERTEL = m.TEL WHERE re.ISBN = #{isbn} ORDER BY WRITING_TIME DESC
